title: Cup And Saucer, 1788
description: Short, cylindrical cup (a) with scroll handle; enamel and gilded decoration consisting of gilt dots picked out in black, on blue ground; large, central, gilt-bordered oval cartouch with spray of three tulip blooms (red/cream, yellow/red, purple/cream) tied with pink ribbon; narrow gilt bands at mouth and base. Saucer (b) with everted rim decorated en suite with cup, the circular well with spray of vari-colored, petalled flowers tied with yellow ribbon.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cup And Saucer, 1788.
1788. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. Gift of Mrs. Morris Hawkes. 1942-25-16-a,b.
